name: An excerpt from "Memories of a Spy"
name_original: An excerpt from "Memories of a Spy"
description:
Follow the "Memories of a Spy" YouTube devlog here!

Been workin on a game about espionage in the 1960s, lots of cool mechanics and ways of playing I'm excited to share with everyone-- but thought this one part of the game would make for a good entry to ProcJam2020.

NOTES
Middle mouse click might not work. Not sure what that's about!
